text: Pretty Poison is a 1968 American black comedy movie. It was directed by Noel Black. The movie is based on the novel She Let Him Continue by Stephen Geller. It stars Anthony Perkins, Tuesday Weld, Beverly Garland, and Clarice Blackburn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It is a cult movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:1968 thriller movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Cult movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Pretty Poison (movie)
